meanings.definition: Gatchers (noun): a group of people who gather together for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: The gatchers met at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The gatchers discussed their plans for the event.
meanings.sent3: The gatchers decided to have a potluck to celebrate.
meanings.sent4: The gatchers formed a tight-knit community.
meanings.sent5: The gatchers' unity made their gatherings memorable.

meanings.definition: Gatchers (verb): to collect or gather something
meanings.sent1: She gatchers seashells along the shore.
meanings.sent2: He gatchers stamps as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: The kids gatchers colorful leaves for a craft project.
meanings.sent4: The farmer gatchers ripe fruits from the orchard.
meanings.sent5: The students gatchers data for their science experiment.

meanings.definition: Gatchers (adjective): relating to a gathering or group of people
meanings.sent1: The gatchers event was a huge success.
meanings.sent2: She wore a gatchers outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: The gatchers decorations added a festive touch.
meanings.sent4: His gatchers skills in event planning were evident.
meanings.sent5: The gatchers atmosphere was warm and welcoming.
